text.text: Edaphosaurus, a medium synapsid from the North America and Europe. A medium herbivore, Edaphosaurus was discovered in described in 1912 and descrbed in 1931. Edaphosaurus was increably sucsessful, living from the mid Carboniferous to mid Permian.
Edaphosaurus was about 3 meters from nose to tail. Eating small plants and shrubs, has many species, varying in size and length.
